attributes.additional_details:
Due to the BBC inability to control its expenditure,in particular to the gross waste of taxpayers compulsory license fee when finding ways to compensate employees over and above their entitlement. It is clear that the current management has no real world conception of the need for financial restraint in any form.
 I recommend a Immediate reduction in the license fee to £100 and to be not considered for a review until  2018.
